comment: Virtual deduction proof of ~ sstr , transitivity of subclasses, Theorem 6 of [Suppes] p. 23. This theorem was automatically generated from ~ sstrALT2VD using the command file translate_without_overwriting.cmd . It was not minimized because the automated minimization excluding duplicates generates a minimized proof which, although not directly containing any duplicates, indirectly contains a duplicate. That is, the trace back of the minimized proof contains a duplicate. This is undesirable because some step(s) of the minimized proof use the proven theorem. (Contributed by Alan Sare, 11-Sep-2011.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
